Name: Driving in bus lanes on snow days.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to driving in bus lanes on snow days.
Text:
Int. No. 142
 
By Council Members Matteo, Rose, Williams, Koo, Vallone and Palma (by request of the Staten Island Borough President)

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to driving in bus lanes on snow days.
..Body
 
Be it enacted by the Council as follows: 

      Section 1. Subchapter 2 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-175.5  to read as follows:
      �19-175.5 Driving in bus lanes permitted on snow days.  Notwithstanding any other provision of law, any person operating a vehicle shall be permitted to drive in a lane with bus lane restrictions at any time when snowfall has caused the department of sanitation to suspend its street sweeping operations, and no notice of violation or summons may be issued solely for driving in a lane with bus lane restrictions.
      � 2. This local law shall take effect sixty days after its enactment.

LF
LS#595
2/26/14

\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows: \par

\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1 Section 1. Subchapter 2 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-175.5  to read as follows:\par
\ul\'a719-175.5 Driving in bus lanes permitted on snow days.  Notwithstanding any other provision of law, any person operating a vehicle shall be permitted to drive in a lane with bus lane restrictions at any time when snowfall has caused the department of sanitation to suspend its street sweeping operations, and no notice of violation or summons may be issued solely for driving in a lane with bus lane restrictions.\par
\ulnone\'a7 2. This local law shall take effect sixty days after its enactment.\par
